```{r}
library(raster)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(patchwork)
library(maptools)
library(ggmap)
library(marmap)
```

###Part 1: Outline Maps
```{r}
usa <- map_data(map = "state")
usa
```

```{r}
us_missouri <- map_data(map = "state", region = "missouri")
us_missouri
```

```{r}
us_other <- subset(x = usa, subset = region %in% c("alabama", "florida", "mississippi", "north carolina"))
us_other
```

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data = us_other, 
               aes(x = long, 
                   y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = "gray")
```
```{r}
 ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data = us_other, 
               aes(x = long, 
                   y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = "gray") +
  geom_polygon(data = us_missouri, 
               aes(x = long, y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = "black")
```
```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data = us_other, 
               aes(x = long, 
                   y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = "gray") +
  geom_polygon(data = us_missouri, 
               aes(x = long, y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = "black") +
  geom_polygon(data = usa, 
               aes(x=long, 
                   y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = NA, 
               color = "black")
```

```{r}
us_map <- ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data = us_other, 
               aes(x = long, 
                   y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = "gray") +
  geom_polygon(data = us_missouri, 
               aes(x = long, y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = "black") +
  geom_polygon(data = usa, 
               aes(x=long, 
                   y = lat, 
                   group = group), 
               fill = NA, 
               color = "black") + 
  theme_map() +
  coord_fixed(1.3)

us_map
```

```{r}
missouri <- map_data("county", "missouri")
mo_scott <- subset(missouri, subregion %in% c("scott"))

mo_map <- ggplot() + 
  geom_polygon(data = missouri, aes(x=long, y = lat, group = group), fill = NA, color = "black") + 
  geom_polygon(data = mo_scott, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), fill = "black") +
  theme_map() +
  coord_fixed(1.3)
mo_map


```

```{r}
us_map + mo_map + plot_layout(ncol = 2, widths = c(1.5,1))
```
